text: Praveen Prabhakar (born 9 September 1976) is an Indian film editor who works in Malayalam films. As of 2018, he has worked in ten films. ==Early life== He studied at St. Joseph's College, Devagiri and migrated to Chennai in 1997. Since then he mastered film editing. ==Filmography== {|class="wikitable" |- !
